message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to counteroffer at $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $87.50.
